review:
Very ************* *** helpful doctor  well explained condition and treatment 
Treatment is satisfactory

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I highly recommend Dr Neelkanth Dhamanskar. He did knee replacements for my mother and my aunt. And both times it was a very smooth approach. He is very calm, peaceful, and a passionate doctor. He answers all the queries with a proper explanation. Also suggests if any further treatment requires. His team is also very supportive.

I had been to hospital and it was for hand wrist swelling related. Doctor was good in consulting me. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was waiting time in the hospital. It was more than 30 minutes. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Doctor was friendly.
Doctor was friendly as well as assistant doctor, nicely explain about problems. Nice staff..no waiting time..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent way of treatment.. totally satisfied with the service..very approachable for any queries..
